subject: Please don’t over-look this e-
body:
Please don’t over-look this e-mail.
My dear this is my (10) good years working under (OFFICE BANK ) and I have no criminal record so far and it will not start in your own time rather you will shows your appreciation to me by sending me a gift once this transfer finalize and you have your fund received as I promise you from the beginning.
You and I knows that there is so many scams is going around the global world today using names of banks offices and company’s to scam money out from innocent people but that doesn't mean that every body is a scam.
As it stands now, I have noting to prove myself that i am not among the scammers until I fulfilled my promise by getting your fund to you, that is only way I can prove myself innocent in this matter and that is exactly what I’m doing so far by try my best to make sure you receive your fund
. Now it is in cahier Check,
I feel the problem you have now is not that you don’t have money to send but lack of trust because you have been cheated many times with this trick of sending money to mine people release your fund. Although, I am not against what you have said because of what is happening to people in this global world today. Remember that you total funds is $15.5Millions which you will receive in Bank Draft Cahier Check if you quickly send this require as directed,
Which I know that after this charge Bank Draft Cahier Check will be in your hand,
 kindly give me this last chance and trust and see if I will not fulfilled my promise to you by getting your fund to you with out any further delays and remember that this will be my last chance to prove myself innocent
, and i want you to know that after you send the $49.00 your Bank Draft Cahier Check will be delivery to you immediately. When you receive these funds make sure that you send me gift to celebrate over long still
so we advise you to get gift card iTunes card,
apple card or Steam wallet card of $49 since you cannot send via Money
transfer services ok because that is the easier way now ok So then you
can buy iTunes
Card of $49 and send the copy of the $49 iTunes to me because
i don't want you to lose your Fund. Send Steam wallet card or iTunes
card $49 and send us the Copy of the card ok.
Send the payment details to me which am senders name and address, mtcn number, text question and answer used and the amount sent.
Thanks for your co-operation.
Dr. Rex Munson Fox

subject: Re: Please don’t over-look this e-
body:
Hello Dr. Rex Munson Fox,

Thank you for your detailed message. I appreciate your dedication to ensuring the transfer of my funds. It's refreshing to see such commitment.

I understand that there are many unscrupulous individuals out there, but I'm glad to know that you're not one of them. Your reassurances have certainly put me at ease.

You mentioned a Bank Draft Cahier Check, could you please explain more about this? How does it work and how can I ensure its safety upon receipt?

Also, regarding the gift card, could you clarify why this is necessary? Is it a form of payment or something else?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Brandon
